definition: the absence of mental stress or anxiety
details:
noun
- the absence of mental stress or anxiety
= synonyms: repose
- common Old World viola with creamy often violet-tinged flowers
= synonyms: field pansy
- violet of Pacific coast of North America having white petals tinged with yellow and deep violet
= synonyms: two-eyed violet
- a common and long cultivated European herb from which most common garden pansies are derived
= synonyms: wild pansy, love-in-idleness, pink of my John
